languages.text: {n}Высокая фигура Капеллана возникает рядом.{/n} "Так это наша наследница! Так?" {n}Он замолкает в задумчивости, затем делает жест приблизиться клерку {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратума{/g}, читавшему вступительную речь.{/n} "Что записи об имуществе Денза говорят про этого сервитора?"

{n}Chaplain's tall figure appears next to you.{/n} "So this is our heir! Right?" {n}He pauses, mulling it over, then gestures for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk who gave the opening speech to approach.{/n} "The inventory of Denz's possessions, what does it say about this servitor?"
languages.original_text: {n}Высокая фигура Капеллана возникает рядом.{/n} "Так это наша наследница! Так?" {n}Он замолкает в задумчивости, затем делает жест приблизиться клерку {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратума{/g}, читавшему вступительную речь.{/n} "Что записи об имуществе Денза говорят про этого сервитора?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Chaplain's tall figure appears next to you.{/n} "So this is our heir! Right?" {n}He pauses, mulling it over, then gestures for the Administratum clerk who gave the opening speech to approach.{/n} "What do records of Denz's property say about this Servitor?"

{n}Chaplain's tall figure appears next to you.{/n} "So this is our heir! Right?" {n}He pauses, mulling it over, then gestures for the Administratum clerk who gave the opening speech to approach.{/n} "What do records of Denz's property say about this Servitor?"

{n}Chaplain's tall figure appears next to you.{/n} "So this is our heir! Right?" {n}He pauses, mulling it over, then gestures for the Administratum clerk who gave the opening speech to approach.{/n} "The inventory of Denz's possessions, what does it say about this Servitor?"

{n}Chaplain's tall figure appears next to you.{/n} "So this is our heir! Right?" {n}He pauses, mulling it over, then gestures for the Administratum clerk who gave the opening speech to approach.{/n} "The inventory of Denz's possessions, what does it say about this Servitor?"

{n}Chaplain's tall figure appears next to you.{/n} "So this is our heir! Right?" {n}He pauses, mulling it over, then gestures for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk who gave the opening speech to approach.{/n} "The inventory of Denz's possessions, what does it say about this servitor?"

languages.text: {n}牧师高大的身影出现在你的身旁。{/n}“原来这就是我们的继承人！是这样吧？”{n}他顿了顿，沉思片刻，之后示意开场致辞的{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}内政部{/g}文员走过来。{/n}“这里是丹兹的财产清单。关于这个机仆，有没有什么特别说明？”
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain's tall figure appears next to you.{/n} "So this is our heir! Right?" {n}He pauses, mulling it over, then gestures for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk who gave the opening speech to approach.{/n} "The inventory of Denz's possessions, what does it say about this servitor?"

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师高大的身影出现在你的身旁。{/n}“原来这就是我们的继承人！是这样吧？”{n}他顿了顿，沉思片刻，之后示意开场致辞的{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}内政部{/g}文员走过来。{/n}“这里是丹兹的财产清单。关于这个奴工，有没有什么特别说明？”

languages.text: {n}La alta figura de Capellán aparece junto a ti.{/n} «¡De modo que esta es la heredera! ¿No?». {n}Hace una pausa mientras le da vueltas al asunto y después llama con un gesto al funcionario del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} que dio el discurso de apertura.{/n} «¿Qué dice el inventario de las posesiones de Denz sobre su servidor?».
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain's tall figure appears next to you.{/n} "So this is our heir! Right?" {n}He pauses, mulling it over, then gestures for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk who gave the opening speech to approach.{/n} "The inventory of Denz's possessions, what does it say about this servitor?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La alta figura de Capellán aparece junto a ti.{/n} «¡De modo que esta es la heredera! ¿No?». {n}Hace una pausa mientras le da vueltas al asunto y después llama con un gesto al funcionario del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} que dio el discurso de apertura.{/n} «¿Qué dice el inventario de las posesiones de Denz sobre su servidor?».

languages.text: {n}教戒官の長身がすぐ隣に現れた。{/n}「これが噂の相続人か！…そうなのか？」{n}彼はしばし考え込み、開会の挨拶を行った{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国{/g}の職員に、こちらへと来るように合図をした。{/n}「デンツの私物の目録では、このサーヴィターについてなんと言及されていた？」
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain's tall figure appears next to you.{/n} "So this is our heir! Right?" {n}He pauses, mulling it over, then gestures for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk who gave the opening speech to approach.{/n} "The inventory of Denz's possessions, what does it say about this servitor?"

traits.locale_text: {n}教戒官の長身がすぐ隣に現れた。{/n}「これが噂の相続人か！…そうなのか？」{n}彼はしばし考え込み、開会の挨拶を行った{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国{/g}の職員に、こちらへと来るように合図をした。{/n}「デンツの私物の目録では、このサーヴィターについてなんと言及されていた？」

languages.text: {n}Neben dir erscheint Ordenspriesters große Gestalt.{/n} "Das ist also unser Erbe! Oder?" {n}Er hält inne, denkt kurz nach und winkt dann den {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}-Angestellten herbei, der die Eröffnungsansprache gehalten hat.{/n} "Was steht im Inventar von Denz' Besitz über diesen Servitor?"
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain's tall figure appears next to you.{/n} "So this is our heir! Right?" {n}He pauses, mulling it over, then gestures for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk who gave the opening speech to approach.{/n} "The inventory of Denz's possessions, what does it say about this servitor?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Neben dir erscheint Ordenspriesters große Gestalt.{/n} "Das ist also unser Erbe! Oder?" {n}Er hält inne, denkt kurz nach und winkt dann den {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}-Angestellten herbei, der die Eröffnungsansprache gehalten hat.{/n} "Was steht im Inventar von Denz' Besitz über diesen Servitor?"

languages.text: {n}Chapelain apparaît soudain près de vous.{/n} « Voici donc notre héritière ! N'est-ce pas ? » {n}Il marque une pause le temps de réfléchir, puis fait signe d'approcher au greffier de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} qui a prononcé le discours d'ouverture.{/n} « Que dit l'inventaire des possessions de Denz au sujet de ce servitor ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain's tall figure appears next to you.{/n} "So this is our heir! Right?" {n}He pauses, mulling it over, then gestures for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk who gave the opening speech to approach.{/n} "The inventory of Denz's possessions, what does it say about this servitor?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Chapelain apparaît soudain près de vous.{/n} « Voici donc notre héritière ! N'est-ce pas ? » {n}Il marque une pause le temps de réfléchir, puis fait signe d'approcher au greffier de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} qui a prononcé le discours d'ouverture.{/n} « Que dit l'inventaire des possessions de Denz au sujet de ce servitor ? »

languages.text: {n}Papaz'ın uzun boylu silüeti yanında bitiveriyor.{/n} "Vârisimiz bu demek! Öyle mi?" {n}Duraksayıp durumu değerlendiriyor, ardından da açılış konuşmasını yapan {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} kâtibine gelmesini işaret ediyor.{/n} "Denz'in mal varlığı envanterinde bu hizmetörle ilgili ne geçiyor?"
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain's tall figure appears next to you.{/n} "So this is our heir! Right?" {n}He pauses, mulling it over, then gestures for the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk who gave the opening speech to approach.{/n} "The inventory of Denz's possessions, what does it say about this servitor?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Papaz'ın uzun boylu bedeni yanında bitiveriyor.{/n} "Vârisimiz bu demek! Değil mi?" {n}Duraksayıp durumu değerlendiriyor ve sonra açılış konuşmasını yapan {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} kâtibine gelmesini işaret ediyor.{/n} "Denz'in mal varlığı envanteri bu servitör hakkında neler söylüyor?"
